Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Exempts veterans from the payment of certain fees relating to corporations
Summary: Exempts veterans from the payment of certain fees relating to corporations.
LawCode: Add ยง104-B, BC L; add ยง104-B, N-PC L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the business corporation law and the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to exempting veterans from the payment of certain fees relating to corporations
